summary: Sent to Montana to hunt down bank robbers, a bounty hunter takes the star off a replacement sheriff who didn't reach his destination and steps into a range war between farmers and cattlemen.
cast: Anthony Steffen|Gloria Osuna|Ennio Girolami|Joe Kamel|Alfonso Rojas|Ángel Ter|José Luis Lluch|José Luis Lizalde|Sandalio Hernández|Frank Wolff|Chiro Bermejo|Enzo G. Castellari|Gonzalo de Esquiroz|Alfonso de la Vega|Félix Fernández|Ángel Menéndez|Joaquín Parra|José Villasante
director: Directors: León Klimovsky (as Leon Klimovsky), Enzo G. Castellari (uncredited)
title: Alambradas de violencia
